events.name: partner_returns_fulltime
events.description: Partner returns from parental leave fulltime (60% annual)

events.name: partner_finds_job
events.description: Unemployed partner finds job (60% within 6 months)

events.name: job_loss_skilled
events.description: Job loss with vocational training (2.5% annual)

events.name: kurzarbeit
events.description: Short-time work, -20-40% income (3% annual normal times)

events.name: severe_illness
events.description: Severe illness (cancer, heart attack), 6-24 months unable to work (1.5% annual)

events.name: work_accident
events.description: Work accident, 2 weeks-6 months inability (25% annual)

events.name: divorce_years_1_5
events.description: Divorce in years 1-5 of marriage (2% annual)

events.name: divorce_years_6_10
events.description: Divorce in years 6-10 of marriage, peak period (3% annual)

events.name: divorce_years_11_15
events.description: Divorce in years 11-15 of marriage (2.25% annual)

events.name: child_with_disability
events.description: Child with disability/chronic illness, +€300-1000/month (4% of births)

events.name: care_for_relatives
events.description: Need to care for relatives, -20-50% work (4% annual age 35-45)

events.name: flood_low_risk
events.description: Flood damage €30k-150k, low risk area (0.1% annual)

events.name: flood_high_risk
events.description: Flood damage €30k-150k, high risk area (1.5% annual)

events.name: hidden_defect
events.description: Hidden building defect discovered, €10k-100k (12% annual first 10 years)

events.name: car_total_loss
events.description: Car total loss in accident, need replacement (0.7% annual)

events.name: major_car_repair
events.description: Major unexpected car repair €1k-5k (25% annual for cars >8 years)

events.name: interest_rate_increase
events.description: Interest rates increase +0.5-2% at refinancing (30% chance)

events.name: interest_rate_decrease
events.description: Interest rates decrease -0.5-2% at refinancing (40% chance)

events.name: high_inflation
events.description: High inflation period +3-5%, nominal salary increases (10% of years)

events.name: recession
events.description: Economic recession, higher unemployment risk (15% of years)

choices.name: do_nothing
choices.description: No major decisions this month

choices.name: marry_age_25_30
choices.description: Get married age 25-30 (4% annual)

choices.name: marry_age_30_35
choices.description: Get married age 30-35, peak period (6.5% annual)

choices.name: marry_age_35_40
choices.description: Get married age 35-40 (2.5% annual)

choices.name: first_child_age_25_30
choices.description: Have first child age 25-30 (4% annual)

choices.name: first_child_age_30_35
choices.description: Have first child age 30-35, peak period (8% annual)

choices.name: first_child_age_35_40
choices.description: Have first child age 35-40 (3% annual)

choices.name: second_child
choices.description: Have second child, 67-70% do so, 3-4 year spacing

choices.name: third_child
choices.description: Have third child, 30-35% do so

choices.name: sondertilgung_small
choices.description: Small special repayment €3k-7k (30% use annually)

choices.name: sondertilgung_large
choices.description: Large special repayment €8k-15k (12% use annually)

choices.name: increase_tilgung
choices.description: Increase repayment rate +1-2% (18% annually)

choices.name: decrease_tilgung
choices.description: Decrease repayment rate due to financial stress (5% annually)

choices.name: refinance
choices.description: Refinance at end of fixed rate period (100% need to decide)

choices.name: early_refinance
choices.description: Early refinancing before 10 years with penalty (2% annual)

choices.name: invest_instead_of_tilgung
choices.description: Invest in ETFs instead of extra repayment (12% annually)

choices.name: job_change_for_raise
choices.description: Change job for +8-15% salary, 15-20% every 3-5 years

choices.name: start_side_income
choices.description: Start freelancing/side income €200-1000/month (15% annual)

choices.name: weiterbildung_part_time
choices.description: Part-time continuing education, 2-4 years, +10-25% salary after (50% annually)

choices.name: weiterbildung_full_time
choices.description: Full-time study with income loss, 1-3 years, very risky (2% annual)

choices.name: become_self_employed
choices.description: Quit job to become self-employed, high risk/reward (3% annual)

choices.name: take_sabbatical
choices.description: Take 3-12 month sabbatical, no income (7% annual)

choices.name: go_part_time
choices.description: Switch to part-time for childcare, -20-50% income (25% annually for parents)

choices.name: major_renovation
choices.description: Major renovation €50k-150k (kitchen, bath, energy) (12% annually)

choices.name: install_solar
choices.description: Install photovoltaic system €10k-20k, ROI 8-12 years (10% annually)

choices.name: move_job_related
choices.description: Move for job, sell house with fees (3% annually)

choices.name: upgrade_to_larger_home
choices.description: Upgrade to larger home as family grows (20% over 15 years)

choices.name: rent_out_einliegerwohnung
choices.description: Create and rent out in-law unit +€400-800/month (7% annually)

choices.name: expensive_vacation
choices.description: Expensive vacation/travel €5k-15k instead of sondertilgung (10% annually)

choices.name: buy_second_car
choices.description: Buy second car €10k-25k + €150-300/month costs (20% annually with family)

choices.name: upgrade_car
choices.description: Upgrade to newer car €20k-40k (every 8-12 years)

choices.name: start_retirement_savings
choices.description: Start private pension/ETF savings €100-500/month (12% annually)
